title: What's up with the honor flakes?
body: So I'm currently on honor 4 and I do get the loading screen flares but only on random occasion. Some games I'll have it and some games I won't. It's really confusing because it doesn't seem to matter which champion I am playing and it's even more confusing when everyone else has their honor flare displayed... wtf is up with the honor flares?!

replies.body:
Honor flares will only show on your champion portrait if you were honored by one non-premade or two premade teammates in the previous game.
You can read more about it **[here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115008474148-Honor-FAQ)**
